security_audit.summary: This skill is a pure markdown knowledge base. It contains only documentation and security guidance examples. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or external commands are present. The skill is a read-only reference for AI agents to understand security best practices.

content.user_title: Apply OWASP Top 10 Security Best Practices
content.value_statement: Applications often ship with critical security vulnerabilities. This skill provides AI agents with comprehensive security checklists based on OWASP Top 10. Agents can use it to identify and prevent vulnerabilities like injection attacks, broken authentication, and sensitive data exposure before code reaches production.
actual_capabilities: Guide code reviews for OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities
Provide secure coding examples for authentication and authorization
Show how to prevent injection attacks (SQL, NoSQL, command)
Explain security headers and their implementation
Document dependency vulnerability scanning with npm audit, pip-audit
Guide compliance requirements for GDPR, SOC 2
limitations: Does not execute security scans automatically
Does not modify code or fix vulnerabilities
Does not access external vulnerability databases
Does not integrate with CI/CD pipelines directly

use_cases.title: Secure API Endpoints
use_cases.description: Review authentication and authorization logic for protected endpoints. Prevent IDOR and privilege escalation.

use_cases.title: Prevent Injection Attacks
use_cases.description: Implement parameterized queries and output encoding. Block XSS, SQL injection, and command injection.

use_cases.title: Dependency Vulnerability Scanning
use_cases.description: Run npm audit, pip-audit, and other tools. Track critical findings and block deployments with vulnerabilities.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Security Review
prompt_templates.prompt: Review the following code for security vulnerabilities using the Security Checklist skill. Check for OWASP Top 10 issues including injection attacks, authentication weaknesses, and missing security headers.

prompt_templates.title: Authentication Audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Audit the authentication implementation. Verify password hashing, session management, MFA support, and rate limiting according to security best practices.

prompt_templates.title: Dependency Check
prompt_templates.prompt: Run a dependency vulnerability scan. Use npm audit for JavaScript or pip-audit for Python projects. Report critical and high severity findings.

prompt_templates.title: API Security Check
prompt_templates.prompt: Review all API endpoints for broken access control. Verify authorization checks, IDOR prevention, and RBAC implementation for each protected route.

best_practices: Validate all user input using allowlists, not denylists
Use parameterized queries for all database operations
Implement defense in depth with multiple security layers
Log security events without capturing sensitive data
anti_patterns: Using string concatenation to build SQL queries
Storing passwords with MD5 or SHA1 hashing
Leaving debug mode enabled in production
Exposing stack traces or error details to users

faq.question: Which AI tools work with this skill?
faq.answer: This skill supports Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It provides security guidance that works across any AI assistant.

faq.question: What is the OWASP Top 10?
faq.answer: OWASP Top 10 is a regularly updated report of the most critical web application security risks, published by OWASP.

faq.question: How do I run dependency scans?
faq.answer: Use npm audit for JavaScript, pip-audit for Python. The skill documents commands, exit codes, and escalation thresholds.

faq.question: Does this skill modify my code?
faq.answer: No. This is a knowledge skill. It provides guidance and examples. Agents must implement fixes themselves.

faq.question: What compliance standards are covered?
faq.answer: The skill covers GDPR data protection requirements and SOC 2 security controls for audit preparation.

faq.question: How does this compare to other security tools?
faq.answer: Security tools scan code automatically. This skill provides contextual guidance for agents to understand and apply security patterns during development.
